name: 透
text:
──おかーさーん……
冷湿布か温湿布あるー？
trans:
──Mooom...
Are there any cold packs or hot packs around?

name: 透
trans: Um, are there any cold packs or hot packs──

name: 円香
text: ……聞こえてるくせに、まったく
trans: ...we're all hearing you, trust me. Honestly.

name: 透
text: ──メロン、持ってきてくれたんだ？

name: 透
text:
ありがと言っといて
樋口ママに
trans:
Tell her thanks for me.
Your mother.

name: 円香
text:
うん……
おばさんにも言われた

name: 透
text: ──おかーさーん、食べるってー

name: 円香
text: ──ていうか、なんで冷の方かわかってるの？
trans: ──for that matter, why'd you figure you needed the cold one?

name: 透
text:
いいじゃん
樋口がわかってれば
trans:
Fine, isn't it.
Long as you can figure.

name: 円香
text: ……今日体育もレッスンもないし
trans: ...You had no gym class or lessons today.

name: 円香
text: 寝違えたんじゃないの
trans: So didn't you just sleep bad?

name: 透
text:
そういうやつかも
そっか

name: 円香
text:
１時間くらいしたら取って
長く冷やすのよくないから
trans:
Once you've given it an hour, take it off.
Chilling it for too long isn't gonna be good for you.

name: 円香
trans: ...all I can smell is the compress.

name: 透
text:
ふふ、うん
これからメロン来るけどね
trans:
Fufu, yeah.
Though we're gonna have the melon soon.

name: 円香
trans: ...Asakura, why don't you eat it over there?

name: 円香
text: 湿布でメロンが死ぬから
trans: cause your compress is gonna kill the melon otherwise.

name: 透
text: こっちで食べたいから
trans: cause I wanna eat it here.
